item.text: Therefore, if you have been raised with Christ, keep seeking the things above, where Christ is, seated at the right hand of God.

Keep <st data-num="5426" class="">thinking</st> about <st data-num="3588">things</st> <st data-num="507" class="">above</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3588">things</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>,

<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> you have <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> is <st data-num="2928" class="">hidden</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="3752" class="">When</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> (who is <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2222" class="">life)</st> <st data-num="5319" class="">appears</st>, <st data-num="5119" class="">then</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> will be <st data-num="5319" class="">revealed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3499">put to deat</st>h whatever in your <st data-num="3196">nature</st> <st data-num="1909">belongs to</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth:</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4202">sexual immorality</st>, <st data-num="167" class="">impurity</st>, <st data-num="3806">shameful passion</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">desire</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4124" class="">greed</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1495" class="">idolatry</st>.

<st data-num="1223" class="">Because of</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">these things</st> the <st data-num="3709" class="">wrath</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> on the <st data-num="5207">sons</st> of <st data-num="543" class="">disobedience</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4043">lived</st> your lives<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3739">this way</st> <st data-num="4218">at one time</st>, <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> you used to <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3570" class="">now</st>, <st data-num="659">put off</st> <st data-num="3956">all such things</st><n id="1" /> as <st data-num="3709" class="">anger</st>, <st data-num="2372" class="">rage</st>, <st data-num="2549" class="">malice</st>, <st data-num="988" class="">slander</st>, <st data-num="148">abusive language</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st>.

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5574" class="">lie</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st> since you have <st data-num="554">put off</st> the <st data-num="3820" class="">old</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="4234" class="">practices</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> have been <st data-num="1746" class="">clothed</st> with the <st data-num="3501">new man</st><n id="1" /> that is being <st data-num="341" class="">renewed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1922" class="">knowledge</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="1504" class="">image</st> of the one who <st data-num="2936" class="">created</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.
Here there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcised or uncircumcised, barbarian, Scythian, slave or free, but Christ is all and in all.
Therefore, as the elect of God, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with a heart of mercy, kindness, humility, gentleness, and patience,

<st data-num="430" class="">bearing</st> with <st data-num="240">one another</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5483" class="">forgiving</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1438">one another</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> happens to <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="3437" class="">complaint</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> <st data-num="5100">anyone else</st>. <st data-num="2531">Just as</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> has <st data-num="5483" class="">forgiven</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532">also</st> forgive others.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3956">all these</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">virtues</st><n id="2" /> add<n id="3" /> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="5047" class="">perfect</st> <st data-num="4886" class="">bond</st>.<n id="4" />

Let the <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="1018">be in control</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st> (<st data-num="1519">for</st> you were <st data-num="2532" class="">in fact</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">as</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st><n id="1" /> to this peace), <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2170" class="">thankful</st>.

Let the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1774" class="">dwell</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4146" class="">richly</st>, <st data-num="1321" class="">teaching</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3560" class="">exhorting</st> <st data-num="1438">one another</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st>, <st data-num="103" class="">singing</st> <st data-num="5568" class="">psalms</st>, <st data-num="5215" class="">hymns</st>, and <st data-num="4152" class="">spiritual</st> <st data-num="5603" class="">songs</st>, all <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.
And whatever you do in word or deed, do it all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through him.
Wives, submit to your husbands, as is fitting in the Lord.

<st data-num="435" class="">Husbands</st>, <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> your <st data-num="1135" class="">wives</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="4087" class="">embittered</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="5043" class="">Children</st>, <st data-num="5219" class="">obey</st> your <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st> <st data-num="2596">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2101" class="">pleasing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="3962" class="">Fathers</st>,<n id="1" /> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2042" class="">provoke</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so</st> they will <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> become <st data-num="120" class="">disheartened</st>.

<st data-num="1401" class="">Slaves</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5219" class="">obey</st> your <st data-num="4561" class="">earthly</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2962" class="">masters</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> respect, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> only when they are <st data-num="3787" class="">watching</st>—<st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> those who are strictly <st data-num="441" class="">people-pleasers</st>—<st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="572" class="">sincere</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>, <st data-num="5399" class="">fearing</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="3739 1437">Whatever</st> you are <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2038" class="">work</st> at it <st data-num="1537" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">enthusiasm</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> to the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> for <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>,<n id="3" />

because you <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you will <st data-num="618" class="">receive</st> your<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2817" class="">inheritance</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> as the <st data-num="469" class="">reward</st>. <st data-num="1398" class="">Serve</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.
